laboratory_examinations.findings: Mild gallbladder wall edema, mild amount of dependent gallbladder sludge within a nondistended gallbladder, common bile duct mildly prominent (8.3 mm), mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation, no stones seen.
3.0 mg/dL, within normal range (ref range: 2.7 - 4.5 mg/dL).
